ðŸ“¦ ggraph <<https://ggraph.data-imaginist.com/>>

```{r}
library(ggraph)
h12 <- stratigraph(harris12, "context", "above")
ggraph(h12, layout = "sugiyama") +
  geom_edge_elbow() +
  geom_node_label(aes(label = context), label.r = unit(0, "mm")) +
  theme_graph()
```

---

```{r}
strat_is_valid(h12)
```

```{r warning=TRUE}
bad_h12 <- tidygraph::bind_edges(h12, data.frame(from = 6, to = 5))
strat_is_valid(bad_h12)
```

```{r}
library(c14)
library(dplyr)
ppnd %>% 
  filter(site == "Ganj Dareh") %>% 
  mutate(cal = c14_calibrate(cra, error))
```

---

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column}
```{r}
shub1_radiocarbon %>% 
  filter(!outlier) %>% 
  group_by(phase) %>% 
  summarise(
    cql = cql_phase(phase, 
                    cql_r_date(lab_id, cra, error))
  ) %>% 
  arrange(desc(phase)) %>% 
  summarise(
    cql = cql_sequence("Shubayqa 1", 
                       cql, 
                       boundaries = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  pluck("cql") %>%
  cql() ->
  shub1_cql
```
:::

```{.r}
library(oxcAAR)

readOxcalOutput(shub1_oxcal) %>% 
  parseOxcalOutput() %>% 
  plot()
```
